verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Mercy and love flow from Your heart Unto Your own Whoâ€™ve come unto You. . . . . Unto the Savior, unto the Shepherd, Unto the King So faithful and true.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}All that I am, all that I have, All my desire I give unto You. . . . . . . All of my heart I yield to Your Spirit Longing to be Made faithful and true.{/lang-eng}
